'''Flammabomb Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Flammabomb Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Flammabomb Wood can be found all across Natlan.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=628 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
